title: raamaa kOdhaNDarAma paahi
sahitya:
rAma kOdaNDarAma pAhi rAma paTTAbhirAma

anupallavi

 I mahini bommalATa jUci kammagAnu oka mATa lEdA

caraNam 1

 pAlugAru mOmu cUpa nIku pAlumAlika Ela shrI
   
caraNam 2

 Ashinci nA mEnu karaga gani nI vAshuna rAkuNDE dEruga
   
caraNam 3

 marulu koNTini indAka E pAmarulu shApincirO lEka
   
caraNam 4

 ceyi baTTi nalugurilOna uramu jErca pAtruDanu gAna
   
caraNam 5

 jagamu olla nanukoNTi bhujaga shayana mammukoNTi
   
caraNam 6

 eduTa nilici brOvu rAja mukha pAlita tyAgarAja
